code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic cin,
    output logic cout,
    output logic sum
);
    always @(*) begin
        sum = a ^ b ^ cin;
        cout = (a & b) | (b & cin) | (a & cin);
    end
endmodule
```
[DONE]
